featureSchema.name: Backup and Recovery
featureSchema.description: Provides mechanisms for automatically backing up data and recovering previous states in case of data loss or corruption.
featureSchema.userStory: As a user, I need to trust that my tasks are safe and can be restored if any issues occur, ensuring my data is never permanently lost.
featureSchema.acceptanceCriteria: 1. Implement scheduled automatic backups of the database. 2. Allow users or administrators to trigger manual backups. 3. Provide recovery options to restore data from previous backups.
featureSchema.diagram: Diagram outlining the backup and recovery process flow.
featureSchema.additional: Consider cloud-based or redundant storage solutions for backups.
featureSchema.prompt: Design and implement a backup and recovery system for the Todo app database, ensuring regular automatic backups and the ability to restore data as needed.
featureSchema.notes: Ensure the backup process is secure and does not interrupt normal database operations.
